locale.message: Plugin to display in Article Level Metrics. To use the ALM service, you need to have use DOIs. This requirement may be relaxed in the future.
To be able to access the article level metrics from ALM server, you need an e-amil adress.
Total number of HTML page views for this article. These views are recorded directly within the system itself. Overall monthly view counts may also be available.
Total number of PDF views and downloads for this article. These views are recorded directly within the system itself. Overall monthly view counts may also be available.
Total number of interactions with this article beyond this publishing platform. Clicking on the altmetrics source will list the single events.
